title: Sonic The Hedgehog (Full 1996 OVA) English dub

sources.title: Sonic The Hedgehog (Full 1996 OVA) English dub
sources.description: Before this was deleted from YouTube, I downloaded this for archive's sake. I think this is the best place to put it. This is rather hard to find physically, and a full English dub is even harder. I hope you enjoy it.
